B

Bug - Class in stupidmodel.agents
Bug agent implementation for StupidModel versions.
Bug() - Constructor for class stupidmodel.agents.Bug
Creates a new instance of Bug agent.
Bug.BugSizeComparator - Class in stupidmodel.agents
From Model 10, agents are comparable with their size in descending order.
Bug.BugSizeComparator() - Constructor for class stupidmodel.agents.Bug.BugSizeComparator
 
BUG_REPRODUCTION_RANGE - Static variable in class stupidmodel.common.Constants
Default vision range of a bug to find empty cells around when spawning descendants.
BUG_REPRODUCTION_RATE - Static variable in class stupidmodel.common.Constants
The specified number of children a spawning Bug agent should create during reproduction.
BUG_VISION_RANGE - Static variable in class stupidmodel.common.Constants
The first model specified an agent vision range of 4 * 4 cells.
bugCount() - Method in class stupidmodel.StupidModelContextBuilder
A simple method to get the total number of current Bug population which is used to create the Population Abundance Graph.
BugStyleOGL2D - Class in stupidmodel.observer
A simple custom color implementation for Bug agents.
BugStyleOGL2D() - Constructor for class stupidmodel.observer.BugStyleOGL2D
 
build(Context<Object>) - Method in class stupidmodel.StupidModelContextBuilder
We perform the initialization, specifically: (i) parse the cell data file, (ii) create the used space, grid instances, and initialize the value layer associated with the displayed grid, (iii) populate the grid with Bug, Predator and HabitatCell agents.
